document_data.name: ''Axe of Great Cleaving''
document_data.creator: [[Laeral Silverhand]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''axe of great cleaving''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[battleaxe]] crafted by [[Laeral Silverhand]] for [[Tommus Tallstep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was one of many pieces of so-called "[[Silverhand gear]]" crafted for [[adventurer]]s who helped to protect [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Description: Silverhand designed the ''axe'' to complement Tommus' gift for strategy and his tactics for battling large groups single-handedly.
document_data.Powers: As the name suggested, the ''axe of great cleaving'' was capable of unleashing a massive cleave that allowed the diminutive Tommus to strike many foes at once.
document_data.Notable Owners:
[[File:Axe_great_cleaving_WoW_promo.jpg|thumb|250px|''Tommus Tallstep wielding the ''axe of great cleaving''.'']]
* Tommus Tallstep, a [[halfling]] [[fighter]] to whom Silverhand also gifted the ''[[Captain's Helmet]]'' and the ''[[seal of patience]]''.
